document_data.name: Dammasae
document_data.deathnotes: [[Cult of the Dragon]] ambushConsidering Shandril is 16 years old in 16 Flamerule 1356, she must've been born between 15 Flamerule of 1340 and 17 Flamerule of 1339. As their trip began when she was eight months old, assuming Dammasae died less than eight months after starting the trip, her death would've occurred between Ches of 1340 and Ches of 1341; that span lies largely in 1340, and thus she's mostly certain to have died on that year.

document_data.mainbody: '''Dammasae''' was an [[incantatrix]] of the [[Sorority of the Silver Fire]] and an opponent of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the early-to-mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was more famously the mother of [[Shandril Shessair]].
document_data.Personality: Dammasae would not talk of herself, according to [[Gorstag]].
document_data.Activities: Dammasae sought out copies of the ''[[Tome of the Dragon]]'' and destroyed them, often coming in conflict with the Cult of the Dragon; she hired adventurers for such clashes.
document_data.Relationships:
At the time of her death, Dammasae was a senior member of the Sorority of the Silver Fire, and had adventured together with Gorstag, amongst others; Gorstag in particular was a close friend.

She had also married [[Garthond Shessair]], and given birth to their daughter, [[Shandril Shessair]]. She was an enemy of the Cult of the Dragon, which sought to abduct her in order to explore and understand her spellfire.
